filter.title: Filter Variables
filter.instructions: Variables may be filtered by one or more of the following options. If multiple filters are selected, they will be applied to the variables list together.

list.name: Name
list.problemGettingList: There was a problem getting the list from server. Please, refresh the page.

validation.maxNaN: Maximum is not a valid number.
validation.minNaN: Minimum is not a valid number.
validation.maxOutOfRange: Maximum must be within the range of valid values.
validation.minOutOfRange: Minimum must be within the range of valid values.
validation.minTooBig: Minimum must be less than the maximum.

validation.numTooBig: The number must be less than or equal to {{max}}
validation.numTooSmall: The number must be more than or equal to {{min}}

method.noneditableFields: Some fields cannot be edited as this method is already in use.

property.classesEmpty: Please provide at least one class.
property.noneditableFields: Some fields cannot be edited as this property is already in use.
property.someListsNotLoaded: The classes list was not loaded. Please, refresh the page.

scale.emptyValue: Please provide a name and value for all categories.
scale.noneditableFields: Some fields cannot be edited as this scale is already in use.
scale.nonUniqueName: All category names must be unique.
scale.nonUniqueValue: All category values must be unique.
scale.someListsNotLoaded: The data types list was not loaded. Please, refresh the page.

variable.expectedRange: Note that values must be within the valid range for the selected scale ({{min}} - {{max}}).
variable.noneditableFields: Some fields cannot be edited as this variable is already in use.
variable.pattern: Name must start with a letter and may only contain letters, numbers or underscores.
variable.treatmentFactor: Please note that in order to use this variable as a Treatment Factor, you need to create two variables with the same property and variable type "Treatment Factor".
variable.variableTypeEmpty: Please select at least one variable type.
variable.someListsNotLoaded: The methods, properties, scales or variables types lists were not loaded. Please, refresh the page.

filter.someListsNotLoaded: Something went wrong, please refresh the page.

variablesList.noFavouritesFound: There are no favourite variables for this program.
variablesList.title: Variables

variableStateService.couldNotSetMethod: Your method was created but not set on your new variable. Please try again.
variableStateService.couldNotSetProperty: Your property was created but not set on your new variable. Please try again.
variableStateService.couldNotSetScale: Your scale was created but not set on your new variable. Please try again.
variableStateService.propertyNotFound: Your property could not be found in the list of properties. Please try again.
variableStateService.methodNotFound: Your method could not be found in the list of methods. Please try again.
variableStateService.scaleNotFound: Your scale could not be found in the list of scales. Please try again.

warnings.deleteUnsuccessful: Sorry, the deletion was unsuccessful. Please try again.
warnings.discardConfirmation: Are you sure you want to discard your changes?
